Salt_Lake_City.Francis Armstrong House:
The Francis Armstrong House (also known as Tower Apartments) is a historic house located at 667 East First South in Salt Lake City, Utah. It is locally significant as a fine example of Queen Anne style architecture.


== Description and history ==
The 3-1/2 story, Queen Anne style house was built in 1892, and was designed by William Ward and constructed by Taylor, Romney & Armstrong as the home of Salt Lake City mayor Francis Armstrong.
